note.title: Docker & Kubernetes
note.content:
#### ðŸ“„ Certificate & Notes
[View Docker & Kubernetes Udemy Certificate](/pdf/docker-kubernetes.pdf)
[Access my Docker & Kubernetes Notes on Google Drive](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/14kRmygfedQRnE5gS9qDiqs54Tr3vc0mF?usp=drive_link)

I used Docker and Kubernetes to understand containerization, orchestration, and modern cloud-native workflows. This certification helped me build foundational skills that I now apply when learning cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP) and deploying applications in my personal projects.
